"The Weapon Palette":
"The \"Weapon Palette\" is a system that lets you register a weapon, and special moves used by that weapon, together as one set.

You can initially only register 3 sets, but will later be able to register 6, allowing you to flexibly respond to the situation in battle.

・<%PaletteReverse>: Cycle the Weapon Palette up by one
・<%PaletteForce>: Cycle the Weapon Palette down by one
・<%Decide>: Switch to the selected weapon"

"To register weapons and special moves to the Weapon Palette, open the main menu and select \"Equipment\", then \"Equip Weapons\".

Each set can have up to six of the following:
・Normal attack, Photon Arts and Techniques
・Weapon Actions

The first 3 actions are the front palette, and the other 3 are the back palette. In battle, you can switch between the two palettes by holding <%WeaponAction_2>."
